鷒字的基本解释

鷒
tuán
〔鹳（
hu乶 ）鷒〕见“鹳2”。

鷒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tuán］
［《廣韻》度官切，平桓，定。］
［《廣韻》職緣切，平仙，章。］
见“鸛2鷒”。

鷒字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鷒； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1498第32
【廣韻】度官切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】徒官切，?音團。鸛鷒，鳥名。【爾雅·釋鳥】鸛鷒，鶝鶔，如鵲，短尾。【疏】鸛一名鶝鶔，一名?羿。郭璞贊，鸛鷒之鳥，一名?羿。【註】言此鳥勁捷，雖羿亦不敢射也。又【廣韻】職緣切【集韻】朱遄切，?音專。義同。

鷒字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鷒字的起名意思

暂无。

tuán
〔stork(
hu 乶) 鷒] See "Stork 2".
鷒
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tuán］
["Guangyun" Duguanqie, Pinghuan, Ding. ]
["Guangyun" job margin cut, Pingxian, chapter. ]
See "Stork 2 鷒".
鷒
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鷒; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1498 Page 32
[Guangyun] Duguan cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Discretionary cut,? Sound group. Stork roa, the name of the bird. 【Erya·Shiniao】The stork, the cat, like a magpie, with a short tail. [Shu] One stork has a 鶝鶔, and the other is Yi Yi. Guo Puzan, the bird of the stork, one? Yi. [Note] This bird is so swift that even Yi did not dare to shoot. Also [Guang Yun] Job Fate Cut [Ji Yun] Zhu Dun cut,? Yin Zhuan. The same meaning.
